dcterms:creator: D. Chen
W. B. Dolan
dcterms:description: The Microsoft Video Description Corpus (MSVD) consists of 1,970 short video clips collected from YouTube, with about 80,000 descriptions collected by Amazon Mechanical Turkers. Each video clip has an average length of about 9 seconds and an average of forty descriptions, covering a wide range of topics such as people, animals, sports, actions, music, scenarios, and landscapes.
dcterms:title: MSVD

dcterms:creator: J. Xu
T. Mei
T. Yao
Y. Rui
dcterms:description: MSR-VTT is a large-scale and open-domain video captioning benchmark that contains 10,000 video clips and 200,000 descriptions, collected by Amazon Mechanical Turkers. It covers about 20 categories and diverse visual content, with an updated version containing many quality sentences.
dcterms:title: MSR-VTT
